snippet: In an area of Long Island that draws all of the people atop the social register, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo prefers the company of family and close friends.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo spends a significant amount of time on the fashionable East End of Long Island every summer, but despite the fact that the area draws people atop the social register, Cuomo says that his preferred company while in the Hamptons is that of family and close friends.
lead_paragraph: In an area of Long Island that draws all of the people atop the social register, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo prefers the company of family and close friends.

headline.seo: Cuomo Drawn to Hamptons by Family, Not Social Scene
headline.main: Family, Not Scene, Attracts Governor to the Hamptons
headline.print_headline: Family, Not Scene, Attracts Governor To the Hamptons
